post:
Hello,

The VPS specs are:

**KVM HDD**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E5606
Dedicated CPU core
6GB ECC RAM
120GB HDD
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH, Roubaix)
Price - $5.99/mo
</pre>

**KVM SSD**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E3-1245v2
Dedicated CPU thread
2GB RAM
60GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered traffic 250Mbit bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH, Roubaix)
Price - $4.99/mo
</pre>

Each package has a limit of 4 VMs, so you can request a private networking and setup up to 4 VMs.

The payment gateway is Bitpay (Bitcoin), it is also possible to pay via Skrill manually, just open a ticket.

You can request 3 days free trial by using 3DAYSSSD coupon for SSD package or 3DAYSHDD for HDD package.

http://www.wishosting.com
